meanings.sent1: Altho it rained, we still had fun at the park.
meanings.sent2: I wanted to go for a walk, altho it was getting dark outside.
meanings.sent3: Altho the cat tried to act tough, it was scared of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall, altho its branches swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Altho the cake looked delicious, I resisted the temptation to eat it.

meanings.sent1: She was tired, altho she kept working on her project.
meanings.sent2: I wanted to go swimming, altho the water was too cold.
meanings.sent3: Altho the dog barked loudly, it was actually afraid of thunder.
meanings.sent4: The old house stood strong, altho it showed signs of wear.
meanings.sent5: Altho the movie was scary, I watched it till the end.
